content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT rate_code_id,
    rate_code
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'rate_code.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
) 
WITH 
(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS results
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH (
    rate_code_id TINYINT,
    rate_code VARCHAR(20)
);


SELECT rate_code_id,
    rate_code
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'rate_code_multi_line.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
) 
WITH 
(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS results
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH (
    rate_code_id TINYINT,
    rate_code VARCHAR(20)
);
